templates: ${name} needs to travel ${distance} miles. ${subj} travel${verb_s} at ${speed} miles per hour. How many hours will the trip take?
The distance to the store is ${distance} km. ${name} walks at ${speed} km per hour. How long does it take?
A ${distance} mile journey at ${speed} miles per hour. What is the travel time in hours?
${name} drives ${distance} miles at a speed of ${speed} mph. How many hours is the drive?
The office is ${distance} kilometers away. ${name} bikes at ${speed} km/hour. How long will the commute take?
A delivery truck must cover ${distance} miles traveling at ${speed} mph. How many hours until arrival?
